DOC.brief_summary: To test effect post operative complication health relate quality life ( HRQOL ) Video Assisted Thoracoscopic Surgery ( VATS ) Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC ) . The HRQOL patient early stage NSCLC assess baseline ( surgery ) use 3 different reliable valid HRQOL questionnaire ( SF-36 , EQ-5D QLQ30/13 ) , regular interval early post-operative period ( 2,4,8 12 week ) HRQOL assess use questionnaire determine difference patient low/no post operative complication high grade post-operative complication . Post operative complication ass patient hospital daily basis use Clavien classification system surgical complication .
DOC.brief_title: Health Related Quality Life After Video Assisted Thoracoscopic Lobectomy Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Adults ( 18 year ) early stage NSCLC speak English No hearing/Speaking difficulty Able walk without assistance Surgery via VATS approach Less 18 year old Metastatic disease lung Benign Lung disease Advanced NSCLC Small Cell Lung Cancer Non English speaker Walking/Hearing/Speaking difficulty
